project_descr: El Quiche was hit the hardest by the Guatemala's internal armed conflict; at the present, this department shows the high number of cases of social violence, which evidences the need to promote the knowlegde and observance of Human Rights

outputs.output_title: Training Program on HR for Ind
outputs.output_descr: This project will carry out human rights education for indigenous persons in three ways:  a) forming facilitators to carry out training processes; b) training indigenous leaders, who will be prepared to hold activities on the promotion of human rights; and c) community groups and relatives of the participants will be sensitized in the exercise of human rights.

project_title: training program on hr for indigenous people in quiche
